section.section: An Executive Director shall serve as the principal staff of the Interagency Committee.
The Executive Director shall be an employee of the Department.

text.section:
Each member of the Interagency Committee listed in § 10-302(a)(1) through (7) of this subtitle shall designate an employee as liaison with the Executive Director to:
implement policies of the Interagency Committee; and
monitor the expenditure of funds to serve seniors.
